mapper.sql: PERSON_ID, EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, BRANCH_CODE, POS_CODE, EMPLOYEE_NAME, EMPLOYMENT_CATEGORY, ASSIGNMENT_EFFECTIVE_DATE, EMPLOYEE_JOB_CODE, EMPLOYEE_HP, ORG_MUTATION_CODE, LOCATION_CODE, BRANCH_MUTATION_CODE, STATUS, NEW_EMPLOYEE, EMPLOYEE_FLAG, COMPANY_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from PEA_INTERFACE_BUFFERS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PEA_INTERFACE_BUFFERS (PERSON_ID, EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, BRANCH_CODE, POS_CODE, EMPLOYEE_NAME, EMPLOYMENT_CATEGORY, ASSIGNMENT_EFFECTIVE_DATE, EMPLOYEE_JOB_CODE, EMPLOYEE_HP, ORG_MUTATION_CODE, LOCATION_CODE, BRANCH_MUTATION_CODE, STATUS, NEW_EMPLOYEE, EMPLOYEE_FLAG, COMPANY_ID) values (#{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{employeeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employmentCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignmentEffectiveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{employeeJobCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeHp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgMutationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchMutationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newEmployee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{employeeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

update PEA_INTERFACE_BUFFERS
PERSON_ID = #{record.personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMPLOYEE_NUMBER = #{record.employeeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_CODE = #{record.branchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_CODE = #{record.posCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEE_NAME = #{record.employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LOCATION_CODE = #{record.locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_EMPLOYEE = #{record.newEmployee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMPLOYEE_FLAG = #{record.employeeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
